title: IV.-A Point in the Same Disputation.
author: Malchion

paragraphs.text: IV.-A Point in the Same Disputation.

Did I not say before that you do not admit that the only-begotten Son, who is from all eternity before every creature, was made substantially existent[fn-31-P3188_814458:2-nf] in the whole person of the Saviour;[fn-31-P3189_814539:3-nf] that is to say, was united with Him according to substance?

references.text: From the same Acts in Leontius, as above.
